member.name: T:WillPower.Extensions
member.summary: Container for extension methods. Mostly shortcuts and parsing methods for common thingies.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.NumbersOnly(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a string containing only the numbers and, optionally, one decimal (.) (the first encountered) from the value.
member.param: If true will allow a single '.' (the first encountered). Default is false.
member.returns: A string containing only the numbers and, optionally, one decimal (.) (the first encountered) from the value.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.IsNumeric(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns true if all characters in the string are digits and, if allowDecimal is true, only one '.' exists.
member.param: If true will allow a single '.' (the first encountered). Default is false.
member.returns: True if all characters are numbers and, optionally, only one decimal (.) exists.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.Convert(System.Byte[],System.Text.Encoding,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Converts the byte array from the provided source Encoding to the optional destination Encoding or UTF8 as a byte array.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.
The Encoding scheme of the bytes provided.
The Encoding scheme of the bytes expected.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToEncodedString(System.Byte[],System.Text.Encoding,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Converts the byte array from the provided source Encoding to the optional destination Encoding or UTF8 as string.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.
The Encoding scheme of the bytes provided.
The Encoding scheme of the bytes expected.
member.returns: The string encoded as destinationEncdoing or UTF8.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.Raise(System.Decimal,System.Double)
member.summary: A shortcut method to implement System.Math.Pow for decimal values.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.AsInt(System.Decimal)
member.summary: quickly converts a decimal to the rounded value.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToTheCent(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Rounds to the decimal value at the hundredths (10 to the 2nd, or a precision of 2). See Round()

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToTheHighCent(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Rounds to the highest decimal value at the hundredths (10 to the 2nd, or a precision of 2). See RoundUp()

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToTheLowCent(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Rounds to the lowest decimal value at the hundredths (10 to the 2nd, or a precision of 2). See RoundDown()

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.Round(System.Decimal,System.Double)
member.summary: Rounds to the decimal value at the provided precision value (or 0). If desired for currency, use ToTheCent() instead.
member.param: The precision to apply to the decimal value.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.RoundUp(System.Decimal,System.Double)
member.summary: Rounds to the highest decimal value at the provided precision value (or 0). If desired for currency, use ToTheHighCent() instead.
member.param: The precision to apply to the decimal value.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.RoundDown(System.Decimal,System.Double)
member.summary: Rounds to the lowest decimal value at the provided precision value (or 0). If desired for currency, use ToTheLowCent() instead.
member.param: The precision to apply to the decimal value.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.Century(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the Century of the System.DateTime as an int.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.PascalCased(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a sentence (or a single word) as pascal-cased ("Mr. George Willington Gracey Esq." is an example of pascal casing).

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.Remove(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the supplied string.
member.returns: The string without the removed portion.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.Capitalize(System.String)
member.summary: Shifts any first character of the string to UpperInvariant and any remaining characters ToLowerInvariant.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToByteArray(System.Object,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Converts an object to an array of bytes.
member.param: The Encoding scheme of the bytes expected or UTF8.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToObject(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts an array of bytes to an object.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToObject``1(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts an array of bytes to the specified type.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToBool(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string to a bool or null.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToDateTime(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the string to a System.DateTime or null.
member.param: If true it assumes the year is the first part of the string. Default is false. Note: If the string contains a parsable date character ( / or - ) it will attempt to use TryParse and return any successful result. If TryParse fails it proceeds on to string parsing.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ToInt(System.UInt32)
M:WillPower.Extensions.ToUInt(System.Int32)
M:WillPower.Extensions.MaximumConcurrency(System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory)
member.returns: The resulting signed integer as an unsigned integer.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.CastAs``1(System.Object)
member.returns: The value as T or default.
